column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Hotah says : " What do you want ? "
#Text=Korra says : " It 's not about what I want .
#Text=I was just following Unalaq 's orders .
#Text=" Korra says : " What are you talking about ?
#Text=" Hotah says : " I - I 've said too much .
#Text=" Korra says : " Unless you wan na be Naga 's afternoon snack , you 'd better keep talking .
#Text=" Hotah says : " I - I 've worked for your uncle for years !
#Text=He said he needed everyone to think the trial was fair .
#Text=" Korra says : " So Unalaq told you what to say ?
#Text=" Hotah says : " Yes !
#Text=Every word .
#Text=" Korra says : " Then why did he have you free my mother and change your sentence ?
#Text=" Hotah says : " He 's trying to keep you on his side .
#Text=But he also wants your father out of the way .
#Text=Just like when he got your father banished .
#Text=" Korra says : " What do you mean , " he got my father banished " ?
#Text=" Hotah says : " Nothing !
#Text=" Korra says : " Keep talking .
#Text="
